title: The Real Australians. Gulpilil: Man of Two Worlds
other_title: The Real Australian: Gulpilil man of two worlds
creator_contributor_role: Independent Television Production Group, production company
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture actors and actresses
Music & Performing Arts/Motion picture actors and actresses
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Gulpilil
Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians in motion pictures
abstract: Documentary focusing on the 'two worlds' of David Gulpilil: within the film industry and living a traditional life as an Indigenous Australian.
description: Documents the film career of David Gulpilil (to 1979), taking in various travels, awards and his success as an actor in such films as 'Walkabout' and 'Storm Boy'. Includes footage excerpts of of Gulpilil undertaking traditional Aboriginal work such as spear making and hunting. Also shows footage of Gulpilil in a music studio, playing didgeridoo with a band, and teaching school children how to play the didgeridoo.
